ambrosiaTutorial.name: Ambrosia Tutorial-Modul
ambrosiaTutorial.description: Blueberries generate Ambrosia over time. Spend them in the Ambrosia tree! +5% Cubes per level, +1% Quarks per level
ambrosiaTutorial.effect: This tutorial module increases Cube gain by {{cubeAmount}}% and Quarks by {{quarkAmount}}%

ambrosiaQuarks1.name: Ambrosia Quark-Modul I
ambrosiaQuarks1.description: Congrats on completing the Tutorial module. You need to have it maxed to buy levels of this. +1% Quarks per level.
ambrosiaQuarks1.effect: This Quark module increases Quark gain by {{amount}}%

ambrosiaCubes1.name: Ambrosia W√ºrfel-Modul I
ambrosiaCubes1.description: Congrats on completing the Tutorial module. You need to have it maxxed to buy levels of this. +5% Cubes per level. Every 5 levels give 1.1x Cubes.

ambrosiaLuck1.name: Ambrosia Gl√ºck-Modul I
ambrosiaLuck1.description: Congrats on completing the Tutorial module. You need to have it maxxed to buy levels of this. +2 Ambrosia Luck per lvl. Every 10 levels give +12 more!

ambrosiaCubeQuark1.name: Ambrosia W√ºrfel-Quark Hybrid-Modul I

ambrosiaLuckQuark1.description: A first generation hybrid module. Gain +0.01% more Quarks per level per 1 Ambrosia Luck! Diminishing returns after 1,000 Luck.

ambrosiaQuarkCube1.description: A first generation hybrid module. Gain +0.1% more Cubes per level per digit in your Quark balance, squared!
ambrosiaQuarkCube1.effect: This first generation hybrid module increases Cube gain by {{amount}}%

ambrosiaLuckCube1.name: Ambrosia Gl√ºck-W√ºrfel Hybrid-Modul I
ambrosiaLuckCube1.description: A first generation hybrid module. Gain +0.05% more Cubes per level per 1 Ambrosia Luck!
ambrosiaLuckCube1.effect: This first generation hybrid module increases Cube gain by {{amount}}%

ambrosiaCubeLuck1.name: Ambrosia W√ºrfel-Gl√ºck Hybrid-Modul I

ambrosiaQuarkLuck1.name: Ambrosia Quark-Gl√ºck Hybrid-Modul I
ambrosiaQuarkLuck1.description: A first generation hybrid module. Gain +0.02 Ambrosia Luck per level per digit in your Quark balance, squared.
ambrosiaQuarkLuck1.effect: This first generation hybrid module increases Ambrosia Luck by {{amount}}

ambrosiaQuarks2.name: Ambrosia Quark Module II
ambrosiaQuarks2.description: Selbst-Synergien! Erhalten Sie +1% Quarks pro Level, +0,1% f√ºr alle 10 Stufen in Ambrosia Quark Module I.
ambrosiaQuarks2.effect: Dieses Quark-Modul der zweiten Generation erh√∂ht den Quark-Gewinn um {{amount}}%

ambrosiaCubes2.name: Ambrosia W√ºrfel-Module II
ambrosiaCubes2.description: Self-Synergies! Gain +10% cubes per level, +1% for every 10 levels in Ambrosia Cube Module I. Every 5 levels give 1.15x Cubes.
ambrosiaCubes2.effect: This second generation Cube module increases Cube gain by {{amount}}%

ambrosiaLuck2.name: Ambrosia Gl√ºck-Modul II
ambrosiaLuck2.description: Self-Synergies! Gain +3 Ambrosia Luck per level, +0.3 for every 10 levels in Ambrosia Luck Module I. Every 10 levels give +40 more!

ambrosiaQuarks3.name: Ambrosia Quark Module III
ambrosiaQuarks3.description: A darkness emboldens this module. +5% Quarks per level, and the effect is 1% stronger per level of Ambrosia Quark Module II.
ambrosiaQuarks3.effect: This third generation Quark module increases Quark gain by {{amount}}%

ambrosiaCubes3.name: Ambrosia Cube Module III
ambrosiaCubes3.description: A darkness emboldens this module. +20% Cubes per level, and the effect is 3% stronger per level of Ambrosia Cube Module II. Every 5 levels give 1.2x Cubes.
ambrosiaCubes3.effect: This third generation Cube module increases Cube gain by {{amount}}%

ambrosiaLuck3.name: Ambrosia Luck Module III
ambrosiaLuck3.description: A darkness emboldens this module. +1 Ambrosia Luck per level, and the effect is multiplied by the total number of Blueberries you own!
ambrosiaLuck3.effect: This third generation Luck module increases Ambrosia Luck by {{amount}}

ambrosiaLuck4.name: The Eight Leaf Clover
ambrosiaLuck4.description: My magical lucky charms! +0.01% Ambrosia Luck per level, multiplied by the number of total digits in your Lifetime Ambrosia and Red Ambrosia!
ambrosiaLuck4.effect: This fourth generation Luck module increases Ambrosia Luck by {{amount}}

ambrosiaPatreon.name: Shameless, Ambrosial Subscriber Advertisement
ambrosiaPatreon.description: In every realm, Platonic sells out. The Global Subscriber Bonus and the Personal Account Bonus will also impact your Ambrosia Bar Point generation. Consider Subscribing to support development and increase this bonus, for you and all Synergism players!
ambrosiaPatreon.effect: Generous Subscribers and your Personal Bonus grants you {{amount}}% more Ambrosia Bar Points!

ambrosiaObtainium1.name: RNG-based Obtainium Booster
ambrosiaObtainium1.effect: This module increases Obtainium gain by {{amount}}%!

ambrosiaOffering1.name: RNG-based Offerings Booster
ambrosiaOffering1.effect: This module increases Offerings gain by {{amount}}%!

ambrosiaHyperflux.name: Hyperfluxed Wow! Cube Industrial Production
ambrosiaHyperflux.description: Gain +1% (3-7D) Cubes per level, per level of Platonic Upgrade 4x4 purchased (multiplicative!!!)
ambrosiaHyperflux.effect: This module increases Cubes gain by {{amount}}%!

ambrosiaBaseObtainium1.name: Basic Obtainium Booster
ambrosiaBaseObtainium1.description: +1 Base Obtainium per level! Exceed the possibilities of your strength.
ambrosiaBaseObtainium1.effect: This module increases Base Obtainium by {{amount}}!

ambrosiaBaseOffering1.name: Basic Offerings Booster
ambrosiaBaseOffering1.description: +1 Base Offerings per level! Exceed the possibilities of your strength.
ambrosiaBaseOffering1.effect: This module increases Base Offerings by {{amount}}!

ambrosiaBaseObtainium2.name: Based Obtainium Booster
ambrosiaBaseObtainium2.description: +1 Base Obtainium per level! Channel your inner er.
ambrosiaBaseObtainium2.effect: This module increases Base Obtainium by {{amount}}!

ambrosiaBaseOffering2.name: Based Offerings Booster
ambrosiaBaseOffering2.description: +1 Base Offerings per level! Channel your... I got nothing.
ambrosiaBaseOffering2.effect: This module increases Base Offerings by {{amount}}!

ambrosiaSingReduction1.name: Singularity Stabilizer Module
ambrosiaSingReduction1.description: Retrofitted with Amber flux capacitors, your Singularities are a bit smoother. Singularity Penalties are delayed by 1 singularity per level, if you are NOT! in an EXALT.
ambrosiaSingReduction1.effect: Singularity Penalties are as if you were {{amount}} Singularities lower.

ambrosiaInfiniteShopUpgrades1.name: Indigo Infinity Shop Voucher
ambrosiaInfiniteShopUpgrades1.description: A Shop Voucher, printed on an indigo tablet. Each grants +1 effective level of the 'Infinity CO.' Quark Shop upgrades.
ambrosiaInfiniteShopUpgrades1.effect: You own {{amount}} Indigo Infinity Shop Vouchers!

ambrosiaInfiniteShopUpgrades2.name: Violet Infinity Shop Voucher
ambrosiaInfiniteShopUpgrades2.description: A Shop Voucher, printed on a violet tablet. Each grants +1 effective level of the 'Infinity CO.' Quark Shop upgrades.
ambrosiaInfiniteShopUpgrades2.effect: You own {{amount}} Violet Infinity Shop Vouchers!

ambrosiaSingReduction2.name: Exo-Chromatic Kinetic Post-Modulated Singularity Stabilizer Module
ambrosiaSingReduction2.description: Retrofitted with... those kinds of Stabilizers, your EXALTED Singularities are a bit smoother. Singularity Penalties are delayed by 1 singularity, if you are ACTUALLY! in an EXALT.
ambrosiaSingReduction2.effect: Singularity Penalties are as if you were {{amount}} Singularities lower.

ambrosiaTalismanBonusRuneLevel.name: Talisman Ambrosia Embedding Module
ambrosiaTalismanBonusRuneLevel.description: With the power of a lot of Ambrosia, grant +0.5% Talisman Power per level! Additive with other bonuses.

ambrosiaRuneOOMBonus.name: Rune Coefficient Module
ambrosiaRuneOOMBonus.description: For each of the first five runes, add 1 to their Rune Coefficient per level! For Infinite Ascent, add +0.001 to the Rune Coefficient per level.
ambrosiaRuneOOMBonus.effect: Runes 1-5 have +{{amount}} Rune Coefficient; IA Rune has +{{amount2}} Rune Coefficient

tutorial.name: A beginners guide to Red Ambrosia
tutorial.description: Much like Ambrosia is the life force of the Gods, Red Ambrosia is the life force of your soul. But you don't really care about that... 1.01x Cubes, Obtainium and Offerings per level!
tutorial.effect: Cubes, Obtainium and Offerings are increased by {{amount}}!

conversionImprovement1.name: Ambrosia Luck Converter Improvement
conversionImprovement1.description: Every 20 Ambrosia luck converts to 1 Red Luck? Nah. Let's lower that ratio by 1 per level.
conversionImprovement1.effect: Reduces the number of Ambrosia Luck needed by <<crimson | {{amount}}>>!

conversionImprovement2.name: Ambrosia Luck Converter Improvement II: The Red Electric Boogaloo
conversionImprovement2.description: Every 20 Ambrosia luck converts to 1 Red Luck? Nah. Let's lower that ratio by 1 per level.
conversionImprovement2.effect: Reduces the number of Ambrosia Luck needed by <<crimson | {{amount}}>>!

conversionImprovement3.name: Ambrosia Luck Converter Improvement III and a half
conversionImprovement3.description: Every 20 Ambrosia luck converts to 1 Red Luck? Nah. Let's lower that ratio by 1 per level.
conversionImprovement3.effect: Reduces the number of Ambrosia Luck needed by <<crimson | {{amount}}>>!

freeTutorialLevels.name: More Blueberry Tutorial Module Levels!
freeTutorialLevels.description: A meta-tutorial of sorts. A powerful ability of Red Ambrosia is to power your Blueberry tree! Increase the effective level of Blueberry Tutorial Module by 1 per level.
freeTutorialLevels.effect: This upgrade increases the effective level of Blueberry Tutorial Module by {{amount}}!

freeLevelsRow2.name: More Row 2 Blueberry Upgrade Levels!
freeLevelsRow2.description: With the exception of the Singularity Stabilizer, add one effective level to all Blueberry Modules that reside on the second row, per level.
freeLevelsRow2.effect: This upgrade increases the effective level of (most) row 2 Blueberry Modules by {{amount}}!

freeLevelsRow3.name: More Row 3 Blueberry Upgrade Levels!
freeLevelsRow3.description: With no exceptions, add one effective level to all Blueberry Modules that reside on the third row, per level.
freeLevelsRow3.effect: This upgrade increases the effective level of ALL row 3 Blueberry Modules by {{amount}}!

freeLevelsRow4.name: More Row 4 Blueberry Upgrade Levels!
freeLevelsRow4.description: With no exceptions, add one effective level to all Blueberry Modules that reside on the fourth row, per level.
freeLevelsRow4.effect: This upgrade increases the effective level of ALL row 4 Blueberry Modules by {{amount}}!

freeLevelsRow5.name: More Row 5 Blueberry Upgrade Levels!
freeLevelsRow5.description: With the exception of the Singularity Stabilizer, add one effective level to all Blueberry Modules that reside on the fifth row, per level.
freeLevelsRow5.effect: This upgrade increases the effective level of (most) row 5 Blueberry Modules by {{amount}}!

blueberryGenerationSpeed.name: The Sands of Time
blueberryGenerationSpeed.description: +0.2% Ambrosia Bar Point gain per level. They say this hourglass has the benediction of Chronos himself.
blueberryGenerationSpeed.effect: This upgrade increases Ambrosia Bar Point gain by {{amount}}!

regularLuck.name: Ossified Blueberry Tactics
regularLuck.description: Most strange. Adding this gold-colored wax on your blueberries makes you slightly more likely to get Ambrosia! +2 Ambrosia Luck per level.
regularLuck.effect: This upgrade increases Ambrosia Luck by {{amount}}!

redGenerationSpeed.name: Millennium-Aged Red Ambrosia
redGenerationSpeed.description: Surely, with how long this Ambrosia is left to sit, it knows something about time. +0.3% more Red Bar Points per level.
redGenerationSpeed.effect: This upgrade increases Red Bar Point gain by {{amount}}!

redLuck.name: The Dice that Decide Your Fate
redLuck.description: A life on every face, until you're finally left with an eight. +1 Red Luck per level!
redLuck.effect: This upgrade increases Red Luck by {{amount}}!

redAmbrosiaCube.name: Cubes "made" of Red Ambrosia
redAmbrosiaCube.description: Hey, Ambrosia gives cubes! Why not Red Ambrosia as well?
redAmbrosiaCube.effect: If purchased, multiply your cubes by 1 + (Lifetime)^{{exponent}} / 100.

redAmbrosiaObtainium.name: Obtainium ""made"" of Red Ambrosia
redAmbrosiaObtainium.description: I don't know why you can make a blue object from a red object. But you can.
redAmbrosiaObtainium.effect: If purchased, multiply your Obtainium by 1 + (Lifetime)^0.6 / 100.

redAmbrosiaOffering.name: Offerings """made""" of Red Ambrosia
redAmbrosiaOffering.description: Wait, this one kinda makes sense.
redAmbrosiaOffering.effect: If purchased, multiply your Offerings by 1 + (Lifetime)^0.6 / 100.

redAmbrosiaCubeImprover.name: Hire Red Ambrosia Artisans
redAmbrosiaCubeImprover.description: They are better at making cubes out of Red Ambrosia for you, depending on how many you have. +0.01 exponent to "Cubes 'made' of Red Ambrosia" per level.
redAmbrosiaCubeImprover.effect: Exponent for that Red Ambrosia Upgrade: 0.40 ‚Üí {{newExponent}}

viscount.name: Viscount of Ruby Guy
viscount.description: For a stupid amount of Red Ambrosia, obtain a small amount of land, becoming 'viscount' of this land. Purchase this to get +10% Quarks, +125 Ambrosia Luck, +25 Red Luck, and a Discord Role!

infiniteShopUpgrades.name: Red Infinity Shop Voucher
infiniteShopUpgrades.description: A Shop Voucher, printed on a red tablet. Each grants +1 effective level of the 'Infinity CO.' Quark Shop upgrades.
infiniteShopUpgrades.effect: You own {{amount}} Red Infinity Shop Vouchers!

redAmbrosiaAccelerator.name: Red-Blue Ultrafusion
redAmbrosiaAccelerator.description: When you gain a Red Ambrosia, you gain a bit of progress toward regular Ambrosia! +0.02 real-life seconds of Ambrosia Bar Points per level, per Red Ambrosia generated, with the first level giving +1!
redAmbrosiaAccelerator.effect: Each Red Ambrosia generated grants {{amount}} real-life seconds of Ambrosia Bar Points.

regularLuck2.name: Ossified Blueberry Tactics II
regularLuck2.description: This also gives +2 Ambrosia Luck / level, but you can purchase a ton of levels of this!
regularLuck2.effect: This upgrade increases Ambrosia Luck by {{amount}}!

blueberryGenerationSpeed2.name: The Sands of Time II
blueberryGenerationSpeed2.description: This gives +0.1% Ambrosia Bar Point gain per level, but you can purchase a ton of levels of this!
blueberryGenerationSpeed2.effect: This upgrade increases Ambrosia Bar Point gain by {{amount}}!

salvageYinYang.name: Yin and Yang: Salvage Edition
salvageYinYang.description: This upgrade, oddly enough, increases both your Positive and Negative Salvage by 10 per level! <<orange|Disabled in 'Taxman's last stand'>>
salvageYinYang.effect: Your Positive and Negative Salvage are both increased by {{amount}}.

blueberries.name: Berries that are... blue?
blueberries.description: They look like Blueberries. They act like Blueberries. You're not really sure if they're Blueberries.
blueberries.effect: Your Blueberry inventory is increased by {{amount}}

rewardTypes.title: Achievement-specific bonuses grant you the following!

salvage.name: Salvage
salvage.description: Gain +1 Salvage per Synergism level! This increases by 1 per 100 levels (e.g. gain +2 at level 101).

quarks.name: Quark Multiplier
quarks.description: Every 20 Synergism levels, multiply your Quark gain by 1.01(!)

offerings.name: Offerings Multiplier
offerings.description: Every level, gain 1.01x Offerings. After level 100, multiply it by another 1.02 per level!

obtainium.name: Obtainium Multiplier
obtainium.description: For each level past 14, multiply your Obtainium gain by 1.01. After level 100, multiply it by another 1.02 per level!

ants.name: More Ant Fodder for your Ant Diety
ants.description: Oh! Your Ant God takes note of your Synergism Level. Gain base Ant ELO for each level above 59. +25 per level until Level 100, +50 per level until level 200, and +100 for each additional level.

wowCubes.name: Wow! Cube Production
wowCubes.description: For each level past 60 (yes, this does unlock at level 70, but just trust me), gain +5% more Wow! Cubes. Every 10 levels past 60, multiply the bonus by 1.07.

wowTesseracts.name: Wow! Tesseract Production
wowTesseracts.description: For each level past 80, gain +5% more Wow! Tesseracts. Every 10 levels past 80, multiply the bonus by 1.07.

wowHyperCubes.name: Wow! Hypercube Production
wowHyperCubes.description: For each level past 100, gain +5% more Wow! Hypercubes. Every 10 levels past 100, multiply the bonus by 1.07.

wowPlatonicCubes.name: Wow! Platonic Cube Production
wowPlatonicCubes.description: For each level past 120, gain +5% more Wow! Platonic Cubes. Every 10 levels past 120, multiply the bonus by 1.07.
wowPlatonicCubes.effect: Current Effect: +{{mult}} Wow! Platonic Cube Gain

wowHepteractCubes.name: Wow! Hepteract Production
wowHepteractCubes.description: For each level past 150, gain +5% more Wow! Hepteracts. Every 10 levels past 150, multiply the bonus by 1.07.

wowOcteracts.name: Wow! Octeracts!... Wait, what?
wowOcteracts.description: For each level past 209, gain +5% more Wow! Octeracts. What's more, multiply this by 1.02 per level as well!

ambrosiaLuck.name: Ambrosia luck
ambrosiaLuck.description: For each level past 229, gain +4 Ambrosia Luck! I like stats with symbols next to them.

redAmbrosiaLuck.name: Red luck
redAmbrosiaLuck.description: For each level past 259, gain +1 Red Luck! I like stats with symbols next to them.

offeringTimerScaling.name: Offerings - Prestige Timer Scaling
offeringTimerScaling.description: To encourage longer Prestiges, Gain +10% Offerings on Prestige per second, past 10 seconds in your current Prestige.
offeringTimerScaling.effect: Current Effect: Gain {{mult}} more Offerings from Prestige timer

duplicationRune.name: Duplication Rune XL!
duplicationRune.description: Power up your Duplication Rune! Each level 40+ grants +0.4 to Duplication Rune's Rune Coefficient.
duplicationRune.effect: Current Effect: Duplication Rune - Rune Coefficient +{{duplicationRune}}

speedRune.name: Speed Rune XL
speedRune.description: Power up your Speed Rune! Each level 20+ grants +0.5 to Speed Rune's Rune Coefficient.
speedRune.effect: Current Effect: Speed Rune - Rune Coefficient +{{speedRune}}

prismRune.name: Prism Rune XL
prismRune.description: Power up your Prism Rune! Each level 60+ grants +0.3 to Prism Rune's Rune Coefficient.
prismRune.effect: Current Effect: Prism Rune - Rune Coefficient +{{prismRune}}

thriftRune.name: Thrift Rune XL
thriftRune.description: Power up your Thrift Rune! Each level 80+ grants +0.2 to Thrift Rune's Rune Coefficient.
thriftRune.effect: Current Effect: Thrift Rune - Rune Coefficient +{{thriftRune}}

SIRune.name: SI Rune XL
SIRune.description: Power up your SI Rune! Each level 100+ grants +0.1 to SI Rune's Rune Coefficient.
SIRune.effect: Current Effect: SI Rune - Rune Coefficient +{{siRune}}

autoPrestige.name: Auto Prestiging!
autoPrestige.description: Why prestige by hand, when you can make your computer do it for you?

tier1CrystalAutobuy.name: Tier 1 Crystal Autobuy
tier1CrystalAutobuy.description: You can now automatically buy Diamond Refineries! Also automagically buys the first Crystal upgrade if you can afford it.

tier2CrystalAutobuy.name: Tier 2 Crystal Autobuy
tier2CrystalAutobuy.description: You can now automatically buy Coal Plants! Also automagically buys the second Crystal upgrade if you can afford it.

tier3CrystalAutobuy.name: Tier 3 Crystal Autobuy
tier3CrystalAutobuy.description: You can now automatically buy Coal Rigs! Also automagically buys the third Crystal upgrade if you can afford it.

tier4CrystalAutobuy.name: Tier 4 Crystal Autobuy
tier4CrystalAutobuy.description: You can now automatically buy Diamond Pickaxes! Also automagically buys the fourth Crystal upgrade if you can afford it.

tier5CrystalAutobuy.name: Tier 5 Crystal Autobuy
tier5CrystalAutobuy.description: You can now automatically buy Pandora's Boxes! Also automagically buys the fifth Crystal upgrade if you can afford it.

achievementTalismanUnlock.name: Achievement Talisman!
achievementTalismanUnlock.description: Wear your Achievements with pride, and unlock the new Achievement Talisman!

achievementTalismanEnhancement.name: Achievement Talisman Enhancement
achievementTalismanEnhancement.description: Your Achievement Talisman may be leveled up one additional time for each Synergism Level!
achievementTalismanEnhancement.effect: Current Effect: Achievement Talisman may be leveled up {{level}} additional times.

runeAutobuyImprover.name: Rune Autobuyer DX
runeAutobuyImprover.description: Permanently hasten the Rune Autobuyer! 2x as fast, +10% speed per Synergism Level above 130.
runeAutobuyImprover.effect: Current Effect: Rune Autobuyer is {{mult}}x faster

salvageChallengeBuff.name: Salvage Challenge Buff
salvageChallengeBuff.description:
Gain +25 Salvage.
If you are in any Challenge, this value is doubled.
If you are in Challenge 15, this value is doubled.
If you are in EXALT, this value is tripled!
Effects may stack.

antSpeed2Autobuyer.name: Impia Reproducta Autobuyer
antSpeed2Autobuyer.description: Autobuy Impia Reproducta Formicidae if you have autobuy enabled!

wowCubesAutobuyer.name: Cubus Admirabilis Autobuyer
wowCubesAutobuyer.description: Autobuy Cubus Admirabilis Formicidae if you have autobuy enabled!

ascensionScoreAutobuyer.name: Ascendens Autobuyer
ascensionScoreAutobuyer.description: Autobuy Ascendens Formicidae if you have autobuy enabled!

mortuus2Autobuyer.name: Mortuus Iterum Autobuyer
mortuus2Autobuyer.description: Autobuy Mortuus Iterum Formicidae if you have autobuy enabled!

runeLevel.name: Progressive Achievement - Purchased Rune Levels
runeLevel.description: Gain AP based on the sum of all rune levels purchased! Best Total: {{x}}
runeLevel.apSource:
Gain +1 AP per 1,000 Rune Levels purchased, up to 200,000 Levels.
Gain +1 AP per 2,500 Rune Levels purchased, up to 1,000,000 Levels.
Gain +1 AP per 12,500 Rune Levels purchased, up to 5,000,000 Levels.

freeRuneLevel.apSource:
Gain +1 AP per 250 Free Rune Levels owned, up to 25,000 Levels.
Gain +1 AP per 750 Free Rune Levels owned, up to 150,000 Levels.
Gain +1 AP per 2,500 Free Rune Levels owned, up to 500,000 Levels.

antMasteries.apSource:
Gain +3 AP for every unique level purchased.

Gain +1 AP per 150,000 Reborn ELO, up to 60,000,000.

singularityCount.apSource:
Gain +9 AP for Singularities 1-100
Gain +12 AP for Singularities 101-200
Gain +15 AP for Singularities 201-300

ambrosiaCount.description: Gain AP based on your lifetime Ambrosia! Lifetime Ambrosia: {{x}}
ambrosiaCount.apSource:
Gain +1 AP per 100 Ambrosia, up to 20,000.
Gain +1 AP per 10,000 Ambrosia, up to 2,000,000.
Gain up to 400 MORE AP, by reaching 100,000,000 total Lifetime Ambrosia!

redAmbrosiaCount.description: Gain AP based on your lifetime Red Ambrosia! Lifetime Red Ambrosia: {{x}}
redAmbrosiaCount.apSource:
Gain +1 AP per 25 Red Ambrosia, up to 5,000.
Gain +1 AP per 2,500 Red Ambrosia, up to 500,000.

upgradeDescriptions.1: [1x1] Du hast es! +16,666% 3D W√ºrfel durchs Aufsteigen pro Level.
upgradeDescriptions.2: [1x2] Plutus grants you +3 Salvage per level!
upgradeDescriptions.3: [1x3] Athena gew√§hrt dir +10% mehr Obtainium, und +80% Auto Obtainium pro Level.
upgradeDescriptions.4: [1x4] Du beh√§ltst diese 5 n√ºtzlichen Automatisierungs-Upgrades im Reiter f√ºr Upgrades!
upgradeDescriptions.5: [1x5] You keep the Mythos upgrade automation upgrade in the upgrades tab!
upgradeDescriptions.6: [1x6] You keep the automatic "Mythos gain" upgrade in the upgrades tab!
upgradeDescriptions.7: [1x7] Automatically buy each Particle building whenever possible.
upgradeDescriptions.9: [1x9] The Research automator in shop now automatically buys cheapest when enabled. It's like a roomba kinda!
upgradeDescriptions.10: [1x10] Schalte einige Werkzeuge frei um Aufstiege zu automatisieren oder so. Ziemlich teuer aber cool.
upgradeDescriptions.11: [2x1] Du hast es schon wieder! +9,09% 3D W√ºrfel durchs Aufsteigen pro Level.
upgradeDescriptions.12: [2x2] Raise Building Power to the power of (1 + level * 0.09).
upgradeDescriptions.13: [2x3] For each 20 Cubes opened at once, you get 1 additional Tribute at random.
upgradeDescriptions.14: [2x4] Iris shines her light on you. Each level increases the amount of Salvage she gives by 1%!
upgradeDescriptions.15: [2x5] Ares teaches you the Art of War. The effect of Ares Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.16: [2x6] You got it buster! For Speed and Prism Runes, add +1 to their Rune Coefficients per level!
upgradeDescriptions.17: [2x7] Yep. +5 exponent per level to crystals.
upgradeDescriptions.19: [2x9] Unlocks new Coin upgrades ranging from start of Ascend to after Challenge 10 and beyond.
upgradeDescriptions.20: [2x10] The Rune automator in shop now spends all Offerings automatically, splitting them into unlocked runes evenly. It also buys levels 20 times faster. Have fun!
upgradeDescriptions.21: [3x1] Perhaps Score will benefit you more? Gain +5% more Ascension Score per level.
upgradeDescriptions.22: [3x2] The effect of Artemis Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.23: [3x3] For each 20 Cubes opened at once, you get 1 additional Tribute at random.
upgradeDescriptions.24: [3x4] Plutus teaches you the Art of the Deal. The effect of his Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.25: [3x5] Moloch lends you a hand in communicating with Ant God. The effect of his Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.26: [3x6] Start Ascensions with enough EXP for 3 Rune Levels per level (may actually be more or less depending on Rune Coefficient). Only affects the first five Runes.
upgradeDescriptions.27: [3x7] Nach einem Aufstieg wirst du mit 1 von jedem Reinkarnations-Geb√§ude beginnen, um den Aufstieg zu beschleunigen.
upgradeDescriptions.28: [3x8] Nun, ich glaube, du hast es? Erhalte pro Sekunde +1% der Partikel die du durch Reinkarnation bekommen w√ºrdest.
upgradeDescriptions.29: [3x9] F√ºge pro Level +4 zum Abschlusslimit der Reinkarnations-Herausforderungen hinzu. Nach 25 Abschl√ºssen skalieren die Anforderung schneller!
upgradeDescriptions.30: [3x10] Du erh√§ltst jetzt +40% W√ºrfel und Tesserakte f√ºr immer!
upgradeDescriptions.31: [4x1] You again? +5% more Ascension Score per level.
upgradeDescriptions.32: [4x2] Erhalte jede Sekunde +0,1% der Runen EXP die du in diesem Aufstieg ausgegeben hast!
upgradeDescriptions.33: [4x3] For each 20 Cubes opened at once, you get yet another additional Tribute at random.
upgradeDescriptions.34: [4x4] Chronos overclocks the universe for your personal benefit. The effect of Chronos Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.35: [4x5] Aphrodite increases the fertility of your coins. The effect of Aphrodite Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.36: [4x6] Raise Building Power to (1 + 0.05 * Level) once more.
upgradeDescriptions.37: [4x7] For Thrift and Superior Intellect runes, add +1 to the Rune Level Coefficient per level!
upgradeDescriptions.38: [4x8] Gain +0.5% more Tesseracts on Ascension for each additional level in a Corruption you enable.
upgradeDescriptions.39: [4x9] Instead of the Ascension Score multiplier being 1.03^(C10 completions), it is now 1.035^(C10 completions)!
upgradeDescriptions.40: [4x10] Athena is very smart. The effect of Athena Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.41: [5x1] Yeah yeah yeah, +5% Ascension Score per level. Isn't it enough?
upgradeDescriptions.42: [5x2] You now gain +4% Immaculate Obtainium per level, which is not dependent on corruptions!
upgradeDescriptions.43: [5x3] Gain another +3% Immaculate Obtainium per level.
upgradeDescriptions.44: [5x4] Blah blah blah Midas works harder. The effect of Midas Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.45: [5x5] Blah blah blah Hermes works harder. The effect of Hermes Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.47: [5x7] Wish granted. Auto Obtainium now gives Obtainium based on your Ant Sacrifice rewards, if it is greater than Reincarnation-based Obtainium gain.
upgradeDescriptions.48: [5x8] Your Worker Ant at the start of Ascensions can now generate crumbs, even without having Challenge 8 cleared!
upgradeDescriptions.49: [5x9] Immortal ELO is now automatically gained, without having to Sacrifice your ants!
upgradeDescriptions.50: [5x10] What doesn't this boost? +0.01% Accelerators, Multipliers, Accelerator Boosts, +0.02% Obtainium, +0.02% Offerings, 0.00066% Tax reduction per level. Every 10,000 levels grant +0.6% Talisman Power!
upgradeDescriptions.51: [Cx1] Wow! Bakery is open!!! Immediately unlock all automations in the Wow! Cubes tab, and Research as well.
upgradeDescriptions.52: [Cx2] These sugar cookies sure boost your blood sugar. Gain +1% Global Speed per level.
upgradeDescriptions.53: [Cx3] Was f√ºr einen herzhafter Snack. Erhalte +0,1% Quarks pro Level.
upgradeDescriptions.54: [Cx4] Pretty dry, but they suffice. Gain +1% Offerings per level.
upgradeDescriptions.55: [Cx5] An inventive take on the original chip cookie. Gain +1% Obtainium per level.
upgradeDescriptions.56: [Cx6] Diese sind ein wenig exotischer. Erhalte +1 mehr direkte Punkte durch Abschie√üen von Challenge 1 pro Level.
upgradeDescriptions.57: [Cx7] Yum yum! Das h√∂rt sich schon besser an... oder auch nicht. Erh√∂he die Obergrenze von W√ºrfel-Upgrades 1x1, 2x1, 3x1, 4x1, 5x1 um 1.
upgradeDescriptions.58: [Cx8] Ein bisschen festlich! Bei Events werden alle W√ºrfelgewinne mit 1,25 multipliziert.
upgradeDescriptions.59: [Cx9] Quite sour for a cookie. But it increases your Ascension Speed by +0.25% per level, so who is to complain?
upgradeDescriptions.60: [Cx10] Wow! Die B√§ckerei hatte extra Ingwer aus ihrem Weihnachtsverkauf. Reduziert die Kosten f√ºr den Kauf von Goldenen Quarks um 0,003% pro Level.
upgradeDescriptions.61: [Cx11] Edible but prone to mistakes. Adds 125 whole milliseconds to the tolerance of code 'time', and increases its reward by +2% per level.
upgradeDescriptions.62: [Cx12] Platonic loves toffee. 8x your Obtainium and Offering gain in Challenge 15.
upgradeDescriptions.63: [Cx13] Brownie Cookies, the best of both worlds. Increase 3D Cube Gain by 1% based on owned Hepteracts (+3% per OOM).
upgradeDescriptions.64: [Cx14] Manche sagen, dass der Ameisengott selbst diese Sch√§tzte geschrieben hat. Wenn du eine Statue von Platonischen W√ºrfeln erh√§ltst, erh√§ltst du stattdessen zwei.
upgradeDescriptions.65: [Cx15] That's amore, but is quite a crumbful! Multiply Ant Speed by 1.004 per purchased Worker Ant.
upgradeDescriptions.66: [Cx16] Du w√ºnschst du k√∂nntest einen weiteren Keks haben, den sie gebacken hat. Verdoppelt alle W√ºrfel bis zum Kauf von OMEGA.
upgradeDescriptions.67: [Cx17] Was zur H√∂lle ist da drin??? Wie auch immer, Metaphysik-Talisman Levellimit wird um 1,337 erh√∂ht.
upgradeDescriptions.68: [Cx18] Was zum Teufel! Das sind nicht einmal Kekse. +0.01% Quarks pro Level und +5% mehr auf Level 1.000!
upgradeDescriptions.69: [Cx19] Kekse, an die du dich nie wieder erinnerst. +12% Goldene Quarks diese Singularit√§t.
upgradeDescriptions.70: [Cx20] The pinnacle of baking. Nothing you'll eat will taste better than this. Gain +0.01% more Octeracts per level on Ascension if the average level of your Corruptions is at least 14.
upgradeDescriptions.71: [Cx21] For each Talisman Rarity, multiply Obtainium gain by 1.04.
upgradeDescriptions.72: [Cx22] For each Talisman Rarity, multiply Offering gain by 1.04.
upgradeDescriptions.73: [Cx23] Each level adds 1 bonus level to the Infinite Ascent rune!
upgradeDescriptions.74: [Cx24] Add +0.30 to all Corruption Multiplier values.
upgradeDescriptions.75: [Cx25] Each level adds +0.3% effectiveness to free Golden Quark upgrades per level! (additive with all other boosts)
upgradeDescriptions.76: [Cx26] Each level gives <<lightblue | +1% Ambrosia Bar Points >> for each time threshold you have reached!
upgradeDescriptions.78: [Cx28] Each level adds +0.3% effectiveness to free Octeract Upgrades per level!
upgradeDescriptions.79: [Cx29] Gain Ambrosia Luck when this upgrade is purchased, based on your Lifetime Red Ambrosia! [Formula is 10 * (Log_10(x))^2]
upgradeDescriptions.80: [Cx30] You intercept a singular message: <<gray|'Why don't you visit more often?'>>...

Every 40 levels, gain +0.001 spread on Ascension Speed exponent modifiers on speeds greater than or less than 1 (Check Stats for Nerds for this one)!

upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaGeneration2: Newly fortified Obtainium Dust makes your charm more powerful, giving +1% more Ambrosia Bar Points per level, stacking multiplicatively.

upgradeDescriptions.shopRedLuck2: This one seems to have a heavy side. I wonder what that is about. +0.075 Red Luck per level. Every 20 levels, reduce the conversion ratio of Ambrosia Luck to Red Luck by 0.01.
upgradeDescriptions.shopRedLuck3: When you pick up this dice, it phases out of existence, then returns, the six face-up. +0.1 Red Luck per level. Every 20 levels, reduce the conversion ratio of Ambrosia Luck to Red Luck by 0.01.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuckMultiplier4: Gain +1% Ambrosia Luck per level! Simple as that.
upgradeDescriptions.shopOcteractAmbrosiaLuck: Gain +1 Ambrosia Luck per digit in your Wow! Octeract inventory per level. Simple as that.
upgradeDescriptions.shopCashGrabUltra: For a nominal price, gain up to +15% Ambrosia Bar Points, +120% Cubes and +8% Quarks per level based on Ambrosia, scaling nonlinearly until 10,000,000 lifetime earned.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaAccelerator: For each level of this Accelerator, reduce Ambrosia Bar Point requirements for Ambrosia generation by 0.4% per completion of EXALT 5 - No Ambrosia Upgrades.

upgradeDescriptions.shopSingularitySpeedup: You know all those time-gated Singularity and Octeract Upgrades? Now they accumulate 50 times faster! Thanks to this weird clock that somehow alters even <<gray | Singular Time>>...
upgradeDescriptions.shopSingularityPotency: You know all those free Singularity Upgrades? They are now 266% more effective (so, each is worth the equivalent to 3.66 levels, before softcaps). Why? This kinda weird <<gray | Singularity Transmission Ritual Device>>! Don't question it.
upgradeDescriptions.shopSadisticRune: What a weird rune; The shopkeeper (who you know no longer can see) says telepathically that it is an Infinite Ascent rune drenched in some <<gray | Singularity Matter>>. Were there other Ascents? Or maybe a <<gray | Descent?>>

campaigns.campaignInfo: Play through <> with various modifiers to make it spicier, but also more cubical! Each Campaign is a <> form of <>. <>

first.name: The first Campaign
first.description: Welcome to Campaigns! These are Ascensions with corruption modifiers, which make the Ascension harder, but give better rewards!

second.name: The second Campaign
second.description: As you can see, there are multiple different forms of corruption. You'll see more as you progress through Campaign!

third.name: Campaign the Third
third.description: Kinda stacking a bit more. Notice the Ascension Score Multiplier? It goes up based on how many corruptions you have.

fourth.name: Campaign IV
fourth.description: Corruptions also have levels to them. Harder Campaigns will have higher corruption levels... and a higher Ascension Score multiplier!

fifth.name: The fifth least Campaign
fifth.description: You can earn tokens by completing Campaigns! Tokens automatically reward bonuses, based on how many you have earned.

sixth.name: The sweet sixth Campaign
sixth.description: The difficulty Score of an Ascension is based on your corruption levels, based on 400 + 16 * (sum of squared corruption levels).

seventh.name: I think you understand this Corruption set by now
seventh.description: If you can beat this, then Challenge 12 should be doable!

eighth.name: Woah, a new Corruption!
eighth.description: This Campaign has a new corruption, which eats at your Diamond production.

ninth.name: More Viscosity!
ninth.description: We wanted to make things more viscous.

tenth.name: Extinction Event I
tenth.description: This Campaign has a new corruption, which eats at your Ants. Oh the Ant-ity!

eleventh.name: Campaign XI
eleventh.description: Harder setup. Oh, and these corruptions can go to level 7 if they want.

twelfth.name: Campaign XII
twelfth.description: We can combine the new corruptions in a way that Synergistically make it more difficult to beat, but a lot more rewarding.

thirteenth.name: Campaign XIII
thirteenth.description: As you may notice, having multiple corruptions greatly boosts your score, more so than just leveling corruptions higher.

fourteenth.name: Campaign XIV
fourteenth.description: You can sometimes increase a Corruption without hurting your run, if it does not strongly impact your challenge completions.

fifteenth.name: Campaign XV
fifteenth.description: The last of the Campaigns before Challenge 13. Good luck!

sixteenth.name: Campaign XVI
sixteenth.description: New Corruptions! Reduce your Obtainium gain, and reduce your Coin gain. Maybe it reminds you of an upcoming challenge?

seventeenth.name: Campaign XVII
seventeenth.description: Amping up the illiteracy a bit, you will gain even less Obtainium. It's probably less important than coins, right?

eighteenth.name: Campaign XVIII
eighteenth.description: Let's up the ante. Six Corruptions at once! And your Ascension Score Multiplier is very quickly increasing.

nineteenth.name: Campaign XIX
nineteenth.description: Even more illiteracy! Maybe you'll notice how hard it can be to earn Hypercubes.

twentieth.name: Campaign XX
twentieth.description: As long as you can handle having less Obtainium, leveling up the illiteracy corruption is worth it.

twentyFirst.name: Campaign XXI
twentyFirst.description: It is also sometimes worth trading one penalty for another. In this case, you get more Obtainium, but almost no Diamonds. Higher multiplier for Corruption Levels!

twentySecond.name: Campaign XXII
twentySecond.description: Fewer Offerings, and less Obtainium. Perhaps your ants can compensate for lost power?

twentyThird.name: Campaign XXIII
twentyThird.description: When adjusting your setup, it helps to slowly change your loadout, trying to increase your score multiplier without sacrificing too many Challenge 10 runs.

twentyFourth.name: Campaign XXIV
twentyFourth.description: A challenging but useful loadout for pre-challenge 14. Can you beat it and get Hypercubes?

twentyFifth.name: Campaign XXV
twentyFifth.description: The last Campaign before Challenge 14! After this, you can change your corruptions at will, but stay tuned for more useful corruption builds.

twentySixth.name: Campaign XXVI
twentySixth.description: Uh oh, it's time for Dilation! It does not make Ascensions slower, unless you need fast timers on pre-Ascension resets.

twentySeventh.name: Campaign XXVII
twentySeventh.description: The last new Corruption, this makes your Challenge requirements directly larger. Trading completions for a direct score multiplier!

twentyEighth.name: Campaign XXVIII
twentyEighth.description: You may start to see how the Corruptions are a little difficult to master. These setups are recommended by Synergists of past, for Synergists of today.

twentyNinth.name: Campaign XXIX
twentyNinth.description: This is probably harder than Campaign 30, but has a higher score multiplier. This is meant to be a challenge, so it is out-of-meta.

thirtieth.name: Campaign 30
thirtieth.description: You may want to consider this as you grind up for the Ultimate Moon Cube Upgrade.

thirtyFirst.name: Campaign XXXI
thirtyFirst.description: We increase Hyperchallenge as a Corruption when we can clear enough challenges to justify the increase.

thirtySecond.name: Campaign XXXII
thirtySecond.description: When you finish the final Research, you should have enough power to take this on profitably. Maybe you will also get Platonic Cubes?

thirtyThird.name: Campaign XXXIII
thirtyThird.description: The Global Speed can be leveraged against having less Offerings or Obtainiums, like in this example.

thirtyFourth.name: Campaign XXXIV
thirtyFourth.description: Are you starting to go for the Thousand Moons Cube Upgrade?

thirtyFifth.name: Campaign XXXV
thirtyFifth.description: You may REALLY want to upgrade that Cube Upgrade!

thirtySixth.name: Campaign XXXVI
thirtySixth.description: As you upgrade the Thousand Moons, you can take on much more difficult Corruption Builds!

thirtySeventh.name: Campaign XXXVII
thirtySeventh.description: You should also bump up your Tributes, if you have not.

thirtyEighth.name: Campaign XXXVIII
thirtyEighth.description: How is that Thousand Moons Cube Upgrade coming along?

fortieth.name: Campaign XL
fortieth.description: Before proceeding in this Campaign, you have to have the Thousand Moons upgrade maxxed. Congratulations!

fortySecond.name: Campaign XLII
fortySecond.description: Congratulations on getting Corruptions Level 12! As you see from the Score Multiplier, it's a huge difference.

fortyThird.name: Campaign XLIII
fortyThird.description: The sixth Platonic upgrade is very powerful, but expensive. Hopefully this build can help you reach it faster.

fortyFourth.name: Campaign XLIV
fortyFourth.description: As you buy the Platonic upgrades, your ability to do Corruptions will greatly increase as a result of their effect reductions.

fortyFifth.name: Campaign XLV
fortyFifth.description: Corruptions Level 13! Woah! You are getting close to the end of the Campaigns.

fortySixth.name: Campaign XLVI
fortySixth.description: As we round out, you should be able to clear Ascensions with mostly maxxed Corruptions. Viscosity is strong and thus lower level.

fortySeventh.name: Campaign XLVII
fortySeventh.description: While slightly easier, you may still get more Ascension rewards due to having more Challenge completions.

fortyEighth.name: Campaign XLVIII
fortyEighth.description: This is the final serious setup. Good job on making it this far, and best of luck on the last two.

fortyNinth.name: Campaign XLIX - The Challenge 15 Build
fortyNinth.description: It's like Challenge 15, but it's not.

fiftieth.name: Campaign L - The Final Campaign
fiftieth.description: The final campaign. Don't count on beating it on your first try. Maybe you need to go beyond Ascensions?

Enter a Corruption Loadout to import for next Ascension. You can have it in the following format: 
 {"corr1Name": num1, "corr2Name": num2, ...} 
 It can also be in the following text format: num1/num2/.../num8 [Legacy] 
 Possible corrNames: "viscosity", "drought", "deflation", "extinction", "illiteracy", "recession", "dilation". "hyperchallenge"

footnotes.buildings: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], or [5] on your keyboard to buy the corresponding tier starting from the top. Press [A] to buy Accelerator, [M] to buy Multiplier, or [B] to buy Accelerator Boost.
footnotes.buildings2: Press [Left arrow] or [Right arrow] on your keyboard to switch tabs. Enjoy!
footnotes.crystals: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], or [5] on your keyboard to buy the respective tiered producer. Press [6], [7], [8], [9] or [0] to buy the corresponding Crystal upgrade starting on the left.
footnotes.mythos: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], or [5] on your keyboard to buy the respective tiered producer.
footnotes.particle: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], or [5] on your keyboard to buy the respective tiered producer.
footnotes.upgrade: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], [5], or [6] on your keyboard to use resources for each upgrades.

achievements.purple: Purple background: Unachieved, provides bonus multiplier.
achievements.red: Red background: Unachieved, provides content/feature unlock.

footnotes.runes: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], [5], [6], or [7] on your keyboard to use offerings for each rune, starting with Speed Rune on the left; must have rune unlocked to use hotkey!

challenges.hotkey: Press [1], [2]... up to [0] on your keyboard to enter challenges 1 to 10. Press [E] to exit your Transcension or Reincarnation challenge if stuck!
challenges.finishTranscension: If you are unable to finish a Transcension challenge, press the hotkey listed above OR click on the red Challenge "C" button on the reset buttons on top.
challenges.leaveReincarnation: To leave a reincarnation challenge, press the grey Challenge "C" instead!

footnotes.research: Welcome to the future! Obtainium is gained through <<var(--green-text-color);|Reincarnations>>. I'd recommend studying the <<limegreen;|green-bordered>> Researches first. The <<var(--crimson-text-color);|red-bordered>> Researches are never reset whereas the <<white;|white-bordered>> Researches will reset upon the next reset tier!
footnotes.shop: Halte auf jeden Teil des Markts um zu sehen was die Upgrades machen!

coinFlavorTexts.1: You have nothing but 100 coins. You can hire a worker, conveniently for exactly 100 coins!
coinFlavorTexts.2: Your workers sure are working hard. Let's buy some investments with our coins!
coinFlavorTexts.3: A million coins! Something tells you that being a millionaire here isn't all that impressive.
coinFlavorTexts.4: You're beyond rich, you're loaded! However, it does not feel... <<cyan | prestigious>> enough.
coinFlavorTexts.5: Even with your prestige, it does not do your 1 googol coins justice. You must <<orchid | transcend>> your idea of wealth.
coinFlavorTexts.6: 1e500 coins! Weren't you dirt poor just a couple hours ago?
coinFlavorTexts.7: 1e2500 coins! Even the amount of digits in your wealth is becoming noteworthy to you or I. Might I need to <<limegreen | reincarnate>> to regain consciousness?
coinFlavorTexts.8: I'm starting to believe that no amount of coins are enough. <<limegreen | Reincarnation>> only strengthens your penchant for wealth accumulation.
coinFlavorTexts.9: Your wealth now has 100,000 digits. Have you even considered how long it would take to write it out? You should ask <>.
coinFlavorTexts.10: Remember when you had just a million coins? Pepperidge farm remembers. <<grey | Your Grandma>> remembers...
coinFlavorTexts.11: The three digits at the front of your total coins are called a <<orange | mantissa>>. Do they even matter in your case?
coinFlavorTexts.12: Your wealth is equal to the number of atoms in the universe, raised to the power of <<gold | 1,250,000>>...
coinFlavorTexts.13: You see the ants from down here. However, do you see the ants from <<orange | up there>>?
coinFlavorTexts.14: If you had a dollar for every digit in your wealth, you would be the richest person on this thing one would call <<lightblue|"Earth">>...
coinFlavorTexts.15: 10^1,000,000,000,000,000 Coins! If the exponent were multiplied by 9, in some alternative <<grey | Realities>> you would overflow the universe with coins.
coinFlavorTexts.16: An exponent so large, many wouldn't know it by name.
coinFlavorTexts.17: Have you ever questioned why the <<gray | Tax Man>> divides your coins? The ultimate creator of this reality, which you believe to be a <<cyan | Platonic>> (ideal) being, instructed as much.
coinFlavorTexts.18: Octillions of digits in your wealth! What if there were other <<green | Octagonal>> objects in this reality? That would be silly.
coinFlavorTexts.19: I still remember ye olde days, when workers were <<gold | 100 Coins>>, do you?
coinFlavorTexts.20: I think you are long past the point where the <<gray | Tax Man>> is the only thing holding you back. Right?
coinFlavorTexts.21: Sometimes you wonder if the Ant God is better off just feeding off your Coins. You surely have enough.
coinFlavorTexts.22: Ant God, Derpsmith, the Gold Guy, <<cyan | Platonic>>... who are all of these entities anyway?
coinFlavorTexts.24: They should write stories about your wealth. It only suffices that an <<grey | Ultimate Pen>> will do.
coinFlavorTexts.25: No one will know my name, but the bards' songs will remain.
coinFlavorTexts.26: That's a lot of coins lol

octeractStarter.name: Octeracts for Dummies
octeractStarter.description: Hello... I Am Derpsmith... The Ancestor Of Ant God... I Did Not Expect You To Get Here. Here Is 25% More Quarks, 40% More Octeracts, And 100,000x Ant Speed...
octeractStarter.effect: You have {{n}} paid your respects to Derpsmith.

octeractGain.name: Octeract Cogenesis
octeractGain.description: Are you despising how slow these damn things are? Gain 1% more of them per level! Simple.

octeractGain2.name: Octeract Trigenesis
octeractGain2.description: It turns out that you have six additional dimensions to modify your Cogenesis. +1% more Octs per level!

octeractQuarkGain.name: Quark Octeract
octeractQuarkGain.description: An altered forme of the hepteract, this gives a 1.1% Quark Bonus per level without Diminishing Return.

octeractQuarkGain2.name: Octo-Hepteract Primality Synergism
octeractQuarkGain2.description: For every 111 levels of Quark Octeract, you gain 0.01% more Quarks per digit in your Quark Hepteract count per level!

octeractCorruption.name: EXTRA CHONKY Corruptions
octeractCorruption.description: Adds one level to the cap on Corruptions. Derpsmith approves.
octeractCorruption.effect: Corruption level cap is increased by {{n}}

octeractGQCostReduce.name: EXTRA WIMPY Golden Quark Costs!
octeractGQCostReduce.description: Reduziert die Kosten von Goldenen Quarks im Markt um 1% pro Level.

octeractExportQuarks.name: Improved Download Speeds
octeractExportQuarks.description: Thanks to ethernet technology, Export Quarks are increased by 40% per level! Only normal ones.

octeractImprovedDaily.name: CHONKER Daily Code
octeractImprovedDaily.description: Derpsmith hacks into the source code, and adds +1 free Golden Quark upgrade per day from Daily.
octeractImprovedDaily.effect: Code 'daily' gives +{{n}} free Golden Quark upgrades per use.

octeractImprovedDaily2.name: CHONKERER Daily Code
octeractImprovedDaily2.description: Derpsmith implemented hyperspeed multiplication. +1% more free Golden Quark upgrades per day from Daily!
octeractImprovedDaily2.effect: Code 'daily' gives +{{n}}% more free Golden Quark upgrades per use.

octeractImprovedDaily3.name: CHONKEREREST Daily Code
octeractImprovedDaily3.description: It will never satisfy Derpsmith. +1 +0.5% more free Golden Quark upgrades per day from Daily!
octeractImprovedDaily3.effect: Code 'daily' gives +{{n}} more free Golden Quark upgrades per use.

octeractImprovedQuarkHept.name: I wish for even better Quark Hepteracts.
octeractImprovedQuarkHept.description: The godmother is absent, but Derpsmith is here! +0.01 exponent to your Quark Hepteract per level.

octeractImprovedGlobalSpeed.name: The Forbidden Clock of Time
octeractImprovedGlobalSpeed.description: Vermutlich in einer hyperbolischen Zeitkammer eingeschlossen! +1% Globale-Geschwindigkeit pro Stufe pro Singularit√§t!

octeractImprovedAscensionSpeed.name: Abstract Photokinetics
octeractImprovedAscensionSpeed.description: Gain +0.05% Ascension Speed per level per singularity!

octeractImprovedAscensionSpeed2.name: Abstract Exokinetics
octeractImprovedAscensionSpeed2.description: Gain +0.02% Ascension Speed per level per singularity!

octeractImprovedFree.name: Wow! I want free upgrades to be better.
octeractImprovedFree.description: Makes the effective level of Golden Quark upgrades equal to <<gold | (Paid Levels * Free Levels)^0.6>> instead of <<gold | (Paid Levels + Free Levels)>>. But, if the second formula is greater then you still get that value!
octeractImprovedFree.effect: Golden Quark upgrade free levels are {{n}} being powered!

octeractImprovedFree2.name: Wow! Free upgrades still suck.
octeractImprovedFree2.description: Who said beggars can't be choosers? Increase the exponent of the first upgrade in this set by 0.05.

octeractImprovedFree3.name: Wow! Make free upgrades good already, Platonic!
octeractImprovedFree3.description: Increase the exponent of the first upgrade in this set by 0.05

octeractImprovedFree4.name: Coupon of Ultimate Penniless Derpsmiths
octeractImprovedFree4.description: Each level increases the exponent of the first upgrade in this set by 0.001, with the first level adding another 0.01.

octeractBonusTokens1.name: Tokens of Derpsmith
octeractBonusTokens1.description: Derpsmith gives you a token of his appreciation. +1 Tokens per level when your challenge completions are maxxed!

octeractBonusTokens2.name: Tokens of Derpsmith II
octeractBonusTokens2.description: Under some weird trade agreement, you get +1% Tokens from Campaigns per level. Pray that the trade is not further altered.

octeractBonusTokens3.name: Tokens of Derpsmith III
octeractBonusTokens3.description: Even grazing the doorstep, Derpsmith acknowledges your bravery. +1 Token per level for each campaign with at least 1 completion.
octeractBonusTokens3.effect: Token gain +{{n}} for Campaigns with at least 1 completion.

octeractBonusTokens4.name: Tokens of Derpsmith IV
octeractBonusTokens4.description: Derpsmith is impressed by your dedication. +2 Tokens at the start of your Singularity per level.
octeractBonusTokens4.effect: Token gain +{{n}} at the start of your Singularity..

octeractSingUpgradeCap.name: Overwriting Pointers
octeractSingUpgradeCap.description: Derpsmith encountered a SegFault after reassigning null... +1 to level cap on certain Golden Quark Upgrades per level!
octeractSingUpgradeCap.effect: Some Golden Quark Upgrades have +{{n}} max level!

octeractAscensions.name: Voided Warranty
octeractAscensions.description: Gain +1% Ascension Count per level, with a 2% bonus for every 10 levels.

octeractAscensions2.name: Hidden Late Fees
octeractAscensions2.description: Gain +1% Ascension Count per level, with a 2% bonus for every 10 levels. But... this scales a lot faster. Must be those hidden late fees.

octeractAscensionsOcteractGain.name: Digital Octeract Accumulator
octeractAscensionsOcteractGain.description: Octeract gain is 1% faster for every digit in your Ascension count!
octeractAscensionsOcteractGain.effect: Octeract Gain per order of magnitude Ascension count increase +{{n}}%

octeractFastForward.name: Derpsmith's Singularity Discombobulator
octeractFastForward.description: Each level gives +2.5% more Golden Quarks (additive), and lets you 'look ahead' another Singularity!
octeractFastForward.effect: Singularities give {{n100}}% more GQ, 'look ahead' limit +{{n}}

octeractAutoPotionSpeed.name: Pill of Increased Thirst
octeractAutoPotionSpeed.description: You can buy pills of thirst-making to consume potions automatically faster! 4% faster per level to be precise.
octeractAutoPotionSpeed.effect: Auto Potion Singularity Perk works {{n}}% faster than before!

octeractAutoPotionEfficiency.name: Vitamin O Infusion
octeractAutoPotionEfficiency.description: Thanks to the generosity of your Derpsmith, Potions are 2% more potent per level!
octeractAutoPotionEfficiency.effect: Potions give {{n}}% more Offerings and Obtainium.

octeractOneMindImprover.name: Infinite Transcription of the One Mind
octeractOneMindImprover.description: You ask what this upgrade does, but Derpsmith just nods his head. What is he hiding from you?
octeractOneMindImprover.effect: One Mind converts Ascension Speed to Octeract Gain to the power of {{n}}.

octeractAmbrosiaLuck2.name: Florentine Cranberries
octeractAmbrosiaLuck2.description: Totally not a reskin of the blueberry! Adds +2 Ambrosia Luck, which can increase Ambrosia drop amounts when Blueberries generate Ambrosia.

octeractAmbrosiaLuck3.name: Berries of a Four Leaf Clover
octeractAmbrosiaLuck3.description: Totally not a reskin of the blueberry! Adds +3 Ambrosia Luck per level.

octeractAmbrosiaLuck.name: Berries of an Eight Leaf Clover
octeractAmbrosiaLuck.description: Totally not a reskin of the blueberry! Adds +4 Ambrosial Luck per level, and it is infinitely levelable!

octeractAmbrosiaLuck4.name: Berries of a Ten Leaf Clover
octeractAmbrosiaLuck4.description: Totally not a reskin of the blueberry! Adds +5 Ambrosial Luck. And it's mega expensive somehow.

octeractAmbrosiaGeneration2.name: Hourglass of Minutiae
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration2.description: A somewhat primitive hourglass which somehow grants +1% faster Ambrosia Bar Point creation per level...
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration2.effect: Ambrosia Bar Point creation is +{{n}}% faster!

octeractAmbrosiaGeneration3.name: Hourglass of Myopathy
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration3.description: An hourglass which is still primitive, though somehow less so. +1% faster Ambrosia Bar Point creation per level
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration3.effect: Ambrosia Bar Point creation is +{{n}}% faster!

octeractAmbrosiaGeneration.name: Hourglass of Infinitude
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration.description: Don't get it twisted, this hourglass is really primitive. But it gives +1% faster Ambrosia Bar Point creation per level and is infinitely levelable!
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration.effect: Ambrosia Bar Point creation is +{{n}}% faster!

octeractAmbrosiaGeneration4.name: Hourglass of Reality
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration4.description: An hourglass which is nonprimitive and 'more timely'- whatever that means. +2% faster Ambrosia Bar Point creation per level.
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration4.effect: Ambrosia Bar Point creation is +{{n}}% faster!

octeractBlueberries.name: Berries that are Blue!
octeractBlueberries.description: Blueberries are a blue fruit. Enough said.

octeractInfiniteShopUpgrades.name: Green Infinity Shop Voucher
octeractInfiniteShopUpgrades.description: A Shop Voucher, printed on a green tablet. Each grants +1 effective level of the 'Infinity CO.' Quark Shop upgrades.
octeractInfiniteShopUpgrades.effect: You own {{n}} Green Infinity Shop Vouchers!

octeractTalismanLevelCap1.name: Talisman Level Cap Increaser Talisman
octeractTalismanLevelCap1.description: You can't wear this Talisman, but it will give you an extra level to (most) Talisman level caps per level!
octeractTalismanLevelCap1.effect: Talisman level cap is increased by {{n}}

octeractTalismanLevelCap2.name: Talisman Level Cap Increaser Talisman - UNCOMMON Rarity
octeractTalismanLevelCap2.description: By increasing the rarity of this unwearable Talisman, you gain an extra level to (most) Talisman level caps per level!
octeractTalismanLevelCap2.effect: Talisman level cap is increased by {{n}}

octeractTalismanLevelCap3.name: Talisman Level Cap Increaser Talisman - EPIC Rarity
octeractTalismanLevelCap3.description: Gain another extra level to (most) Talisman level caps per level!
octeractTalismanLevelCap3.effect: Talisman level cap is increased by {{n}}

octeractTalismanLevelCap4.name: Talisman Level Cap Increaser Talisman - MYTHIC Rarity
octeractTalismanLevelCap4.description: I think you can guess what the <<crimson | ‚úé>> Signature of this Talisman would be...
octeractTalismanLevelCap4.effect: Talisman level cap is increased by {{n}}

runes.recycleChance: You have {{amount}} Salvage. The amount of Offerings needed to level up Runes, Blessings, and Spirits is divided by {{mult}}!
runes.recycleChanceDividedBy: You have {{amount}} Salvage. The amount of Offerings needed to level up Runes, Blessings, and Spirits is multiplied by {{div}}.
runes.hover: Fahre √ºber Runen-Icons, um Details dar√ºber zu sehen was sie tun und wie sie dir helfen!
runes.thanksResearches: üúá The effect of the first five Runes is increased by {{percent}}%

speed.name: Speed
speed.description: An energy emanates from this stone. You feel compelled to inscribe power into it with your Offerings.
speed.lockedDescription: Erm. This should be unlocked. If you see this, please report it as a bug.
speed.values: +0.02% Accelerator Power, +0.25% Free Accelerators per level. Global Speed (affecting resource production, and most reset timers) is multiplied by up to 2!
speed.effect: Speed Rune Bonus: +{{val}}% Accelerator Power, +{{val2}} Free Accelerators, +{{val3}} Global Speed.

duplication.name: Duplication
duplication.description: "Its ability lies in the world inside of the mirror..." -some bizarre inscription
duplication.lockedDescription: This rune is locked! To unlock it, Prestige 100 times. You even get an Achievement for it!
duplication.values: +0.2 Multiplier Power Boost (each gives +0.02 to Multiplier Power), +0.25% Free Multipliers per level. Tax growth is delayed more for each level (cap: 99.9%)!
duplication.effect: Duplication Rune Bonus: +{{val}} Multiplier Power Boosts, +{{val2}} Free Multipliers, -{{val3}}% Tax Growth.

prism.name: Prism
prism.description: Has all colors of the visible light spectrum. As well as a few you cannot yet fathom.
prism.lockedDescription: This rune is locked! To unlock it, Transcend 1,000 times. You even get an Achievement for it!
prism.costDivisor: <<lightblue | Crystal Upgrade Costs /{{val}}>> (Divide by 10 every 10 Power)
prism.values: ~(1 + (Level/2)^2 * 2^(Level/2) / 256)x Crystal Production. Every 10 Rune Power, divide the cost of all Crystal Upgrades by 10.
prism.effect: Prism Rune Bonus: All Crystal Producer production multiplied by {{val}}x, The costs of all Crystal Upgrades is divided by {{val2}}.

thrift.name: Thrift
thrift.description: It seems with this Rune in tow, you keep making great deals on your purchases, and your Offerings are just a little more reusable.
thrift.lockedDescription: This rune is locked! To unlock it, Reincarnate 10,000 times. You even get an Achievement for it!
thrift.costDelay: <<lime | Building Cost Growth Delay +{{val}}%>> (+0.125% per Power, max +1.00e15% at 8e15 Power)
thrift.values: +0.125% building cost growth delay per level, more Salvage per level (log scaling), Tax Growth is delayed more for each level (cap: 99%)!
thrift.effect: Thrift Rune Bonus: Delay all producer cost increases by {{val}}%, Salvage: +{{val2}}. -{{val3}}% Tax Growth

superiorIntellect.name: Superior Intellect
superiorIntellect.description: Over a hundred times the number of brain cells the average human has, put into one rock. It's probably sentient.
superiorIntellect.lockedDescription: This rune is locked! Unlocking it might require some novel Research.
superiorIntellect.values: (1 + level/2000)x Offerings, (1 + level/200)x Obtainium, (1 + Level^2/2500)x Ant Hatch Speed
superiorIntellect.effect: S. Intellect Rune Bonus: Offerings x{{val}}, Obtainium x{{val2}}, Ant Speed x{{val3}}

infiniteAscent.name: Infinite Ascent
infiniteAscent.description: A staircase you can only climb facing backwards, how weird is that?
infiniteAscent.lockedDescription: This rune is locked! You may need some Quarks to unlock this one. Or, head to the <<gold | PseudoCoins>> tab to unlock it instantly!
infiniteAscent.salvage: BONUS! <> (+{{val2}} per Power. see Infinite Recycling)
infiniteAscent.values: +0.2% Quarks, +1% all Cube types per level! Start with +10% Quarks.
infiniteAscent.effect: IA Rune Bonus: Quark Gain +{{val}}, Ascensions give +{{val2}} more Cubes.

antiquities.name: Antiquities of Ant God
antiquities.description: The piece of eight, long thought lost, no longer. It went there and back again.
antiquities.lockedDescription: This rune is locked! To unlock it, you might need to buy something that should be left unbought.
antiquities.singularityUnlock: Something singular that's unlocked at Level 1: {{symbol}}
antiquities.addCode: <<lightgray | 'Add' Code Refresh Interval {{val}}>> (-20% at 1 Power, up to -50%)
antiquities.values: Level 1 unlocks something special! Each level gives 10x Offerings, 10x <> Obtainium and makes code 'Add' regenerate faster.
antiquities.effect: Offerings x{{val}}, <<cyan | Immaculate>> Obtainium x{{val2}}, 'Add' code regeneration interval is {{val3}}% as long.

horseShoe.name: The Horse's Shoe
horseShoe.description: I never realized the world was so easily won, just by realizing you got someone to say you won't be lonely anymore.
horseShoe.lockedDescription: This rune is locked! To unlock it, you might need to tussle with the <<lightgray|Taxman>> himself.
horseShoe.values: Each level gives you +1 Ambrosia Luck, +0.2 Red Luck. You also reduce the Luck Conversion Ratio between the two by up to 0.5, depending on level (-0.5 * level / (level + 50))
horseShoe.effect: Horseshoe Rune Bonus: +{{val}} Ambrosia Luck, +{{val2}} Red Luck, {{val3}} Luck Conversion Ratio.

finiteDescent.name: Finite Descent
finiteDescent.description: That shopkeep told me it was an Ascent. That liar!
finiteDescent.lockedDescription: This rune is locked! Honestly, I have no idea how you unlock this.
finiteDescent.infiniteAscentLevels: <<lightgoldenrodyellow | +{{val}} Free Infinite Ascent levels>> (+1 every 2 Power)
finiteDescent.values: Gain up to 2x more Ascension Score for your current Ascension, increase your free Corruption levels up to 0.15, and tack on +1 free Infinite Ascent level every two levels. Shweet!
finiteDescent.effect: This Ascension, gain +{{val}} Ascension Score, {{val2}} free Corruption levels, and +{{val3}} Infinite Ascent levels.

levelup.1: +(Level/4)^1.25 Accelerator, +0.25% Accelerators per level. +1 Accelerator Boost every 20 levels!
levelup.2: +(Level/10) Multipliers every 10th level, +0.25% Multipliers per level. Tax growth is delayed more for each level!
levelup.3: ~(1 + (Level/2)^2 * 2^(Level/2) / 256)x Crystal Production. +1 free level for each Crystal upgrade per 16 levels!
levelup.4: +0.125% building cost growth delay per level, +0.0625% Offering recycle chance per level [MAX: 25%], 2^((1000 - Level)/1100) Tax growth multiplier AFTER level 400
levelup.5: ~(1 + level/200)x Obtainium, (1 + Level^2/2500)x Ant Hatch Speed, (1 + level/2000)x Offerings
levelup.6: +0.2% Quarks, +1% all Cube types per level! Start with +10% Quarks.
levelup.7: I wonder what happens if you feed it {{exp}} Rune EXP.

noSingularityUpgrades.name: No Golden Quark Upgrades
noSingularityUpgrades.description:
Simply put, you have to beat the target Singularity without (most) Golden Quark Upgrades.
Octeracts, Perks and Quality of Life Singularity Upgrades are preserved.
noSingularityUpgrades.UniqueReward5: 30th - A new <<orchid|Quark Shop>> upgrade for NOT FREE!

oneChallengeCap.name: One Challenge Caps
oneChallengeCap.description: Beat the target Singularity, but the first 14 Challenges have cap of only 1!
oneChallengeCap.UniqueReward4: 25th - +7 <<green|Reincarnation Challenge>> Cap! And +2 to Ascension Challenge caps.

noOcteracts.name: No Octeract Effects
noOcteracts.description:
Beat the target Singularity, but octeracts and their upgrades do nothing!
Effective Singularity is also much higher based on tier.
noOcteracts.ScalingReward1: +0.02 increase to <<var(--lightseagreen-text-color)|OCTERACT to CUBE>> bonus power (Base: 2.00) [effect halved after 10 completions]

limitedAscensions.name: Twenty Ascensions Challenge
limitedAscensions.description:
Derpsmith put an embargo on Ascensions. Only (20 - completions) are allowed throughout the entire Singularity, before Ascensions trigger massive debuffs!
Ascension Count Multiplier is hardcapped at 1. Oh and Delta is disabled. Ha.
limitedAscensions.ScalingReward1: <<orange|+0.1% Ascension Speed>> per Digit in your <<orange|Ascension Count!>>
limitedAscensions.UniqueReward1: 1st - Permanently double the cap of <<Pink|all Hepteracts>> for free!!! (This is really good!)

noAmbrosiaUpgrades.name: No Ambrosia Upgrades
noAmbrosiaUpgrades.description:
Gold Guy has lost his muster (and yes, that's his name!) and needs your help.
Clear the Singularity without any effects from Ambrosia or Ambrosia-Tier Upgrades!
noAmbrosiaUpgrades.UniqueReward3: 1st - Unlock <<red|Red Ambrosia>>! It's like Ambrosia, but <<red|red>>.

limitedTime.name: The Grand Singularity Speedrun!
limitedTime.description: Time, time is something never meant to last. Beat the target Singularity, but the fabric of your reality quickly collapses.
limitedTime.timeMod2: <<gold|‚ö†>> After the time limit, your Obtainium, Offering, and Cube production is divided by <<red|{{perSecondDivisor}}>> per second.
limitedTime.timeMod3: Derpsmith gives you a slight boost: <<#00DDFF | 5x faster Reborn ELO Creation Speed!>> Until you buy Antiquities, at least.
limitedTime.UniqueReward1: 1st - Your quarks no longer reset on Singularity!
limitedTime.UniqueReward3: 25th - A very expensive, not good, pretty bad <<orange|Quark Shop>> upgrade!

sadisticPrequel.name: SADISTIC EXALT III - The Prequel
sadisticPrequel.description: How much more will Platonic misuse the word 'Sadistic'? [No Sing Upgrade, Oct Upgrades OR Ambrosia Upgrades]
sadisticPrequel.ScalingReward2: +3% more <<orange|Free Upgrades>> from code 'Daily' per completion!

taxmanLastStand.name: The Taxman's Last Stand
taxmanLastStand.description: The Tax Man, wanting the Ultimate Pen, has some devious new tricks up his sleeve. Beat the target Singularity, except:

descriptions.1: +0.0090% Cubes per Corruption level per level!
descriptions.2: +0.018% Tesseracts per Corruption level per level!
descriptions.3: +0.054% Hypercubes per Corruption level per level!
descriptions.4: Gain +2.4% Platonic Cubes per level! It is that simple.
descriptions.5: C10 Exponent: 1.035 --> 1.0375, Constant tax exponent +0.10, 2x faster Constant production, 1.05x Quarks, +10 Reincarnation Challenge Cap, +5 Ascension Challenge Cap, 2x Immaculate Obtainium and Offerings, ^1.10 coin gain in C15, as well +1 Corruption Cap Level!
descriptions.6: Viscous's exponent is multiplied by 1+(level/30), capped at ^1.
descriptions.7: Global speed below 1x is raised to ^1-(level/30), ignoring Immaculate multipliers.
descriptions.8: The Hyperchallenge Cube's effect is divided by 1+(level*0.4), with a minimum of 1x.
descriptions.9: Gain 2.5x Immaculate Obtainium and multiply Defunded Education's exponent by 1+log10(Obtainium+1)/100, capped at 1e100 Obtainium.
descriptions.10: C10 Exponent: 1.0375 --> 1.04, Constant tax exponent +0.20, 10x faster Constant production, 1.10x Quarks, +10 Reincarnation Challenge Cap, +5 Ascension Challenge Cap, 3.5x Immaculate Obtainium and Offerings, 2x All Cubes, ^1.25 ant exponent in C15, +1 Corruption Cap Level again!
descriptions.11: If Crystal Mine Collapse is set to level 11 or higher, Reincarnations will also give Diamonds based on Particle gain!
descriptions.12: For each level of Extinction, gain +0.5% more Ant ELO, per level of this upgrade! (Additive to other sources). Reborn ELO is created 10% faster per level!
descriptions.13: 'Less Fruitful Harvests' reduces your <<green|Salvage>> by 50% less!
descriptions.14: Multiply Great Depression II's coin exponent by 1.55, but only in Challenge 15.
descriptions.15: You begin to find the start of the abyss. Coin Exponent +0.10 in Challenge 15, Challenge 15 Score +25%, Ascension Speed +0.2% per Corruption Level (Max: 20%), +1% to 3D-7D (Cube-Hepteracts) Cubes per C9 Completion (Multiplicative), 1.15x Quarks, 1e250x Tesseract Building Multiplier, 2x Ascension Count, +30 Reincarnation Challenge Cap, +20 Ascension Challenge Cap, 6x Immaculate Obtainium and Offerings! Talk about a deep dive.
descriptions.16: Increase powder conversion rate by 1% per level, gain +2% Ascension count per level and gain up to 2% more Ascension count per level based on powder, up to 100,000. This will also multiply Tesseract Building production by (Powder + 1)^(10 * level), uncapped.
descriptions.17: If this is bought, Viscous's score multiplier is raised to 3+(level*0.04) if its level is set to 10 or higher.
descriptions.18: Raise the base percentage of Constant Upgrade 1 by 0.1% and increase the base percentage cap of Constant Upgrade 2 by 0.3% per level!
descriptions.19: The Chronos Hepteract's diminishing return exponent is increased by level/750 (roughly 0.00133). (Base: 1/6)
descriptions.20: You know, maybe some things should be left unbought.

platonicUpgrades.20Bought: While I strongly recommended you not to buy this, you did it anyway. For that, you have unlocked the Antiquities of Ant God Rune.

main.ascendPrompt: Ascending will reset your Buildings, (some) Runes and Talismans, Upgrades, most Researches, Anthill Count, Immortal ELO, and your Transcension/Reincarnation Challenges, in exchange for industrial Wow! Cubes. Shop Upgrades are preserved. Continue?
main.reincarnatePrompt: Reincarnating will reset EVERYTHING but in return you will get extraordinarily powerful Particles, and unlock some very strong upgrades and some new features. would you like to Reincarnate? [Disable this message in settings.]
main.transcendPrompt: Transcends will reset coin and prestige upgrades, coin producers, crystal producers AND diamonds. The first Transcension unlocks new features. Would you like to Transcend? [Toggle this message in settings.]
main.prestigePrompt: Prestige will reset coin upgrades, coin producers AND crystals. The first Prestige unlocks new features. Would you like to Prestige? [Toggle this message in settings.]
main.welcomeToSingularity: Welcome to Singularity #{{x}}. You're back to familiar territory, but something doesn't seem right.
main.singularityCancelled: If you decide to change your mind, let me know. -Ant God
main.singularityMessage1: You have reached the end of the game, on Singularity #{{x}}. Platonic and the Ant God are proud of you.
main.singularityMessage2: You may choose to sit on your laurels, and consider the game 'beaten', or you may do something more interesting.
main.singularityMessage3: You're too powerful for this current universe. The multiverse of Synergism is truly endless, but out there are even more challenging universes parallel to your very own.
main.singularityMessage4: Start anew, and enter Singularity #{{x}}. Your next universe is harder than your current one, but unlock a permanent +10% Quark Bonus, +10% Ascension Count Bonus, and Gain {{y}} Golden Quarks, which can purchase game-changing endgame upgrades [Boosted by {{z}}% due to patreon bonus!].
main.singularityMessage5: However, all your past accomplishments are gone! ALL Challenges, Refundable Shop upgrades, Upgrade Tab, Runes, All Cube upgrades, All Cube Openings, Hepteracts (Except for your Quark Hepteracts), Achievements will be wiped clean.
main.singularityConfirm0: Do you wish to start singularity #{{x}}? Your next universe is harder but you will gain {{y}} Golden Quarks.
main.singularityConfirm1: So, what do you say? Do you wish to enter the Singularity?
main.singularityConfirm2: Are you sure you wish to enter the Singularity?
main.singularityConfirm3: Are you REALLY SURE? You cannot go back from this (without an older savefile)! Confirm one last time to finalize your decision.
main.noAntiquity: Hmph. Please return with an Antiquity. Thank you. -Ant God
main.insideSingularityChallenge: Derpsmith thinks you are in a Singularity Challenge. You may exit it by clicking on the challenge icon in the Singularity tab.
main.gameBeat: Well. It seems you've reached the eye of the Singularity. I'm pleased. This also means there is nowhere to go from here. At least, not until higher powers expand your journey.
main.exitAscensionChallenge: Are you absolutely sure that you want to exit the Ascension Challenge? You will need to clear challenge 10 again before you can attempt the challenge again!
main.statSymbolConfirm: Would you like to toggle Stat Symbols? This will refresh the page! [If you see a symbol next to the word 'Quark' then they are currently on. Otherwise they are currently off]
